metadata.title: CVE-2024-35864 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: fix potential UAF in smb2_is_valid_lease_break()Skip sessions that are being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) toavoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
